document_notes.text:
This update for transfig fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-14275: Fixed stack-based buffer overflow in the calc_arrow function (bsc#1143650).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: Xfig fig2dev 3.2.7a has a stack-based buffer overflow in the calc_arrow function in bound.c.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description

description.text: To install this SUSE Security Update use the SUSE recommended installation methods like YaST online_update or "zypper patch".
